text: I don't care how old I get I love
bubbles over 1 million people were blown
away by time moving this smoke-filled
bubble through the other bubbles but how
does he pull it off without making
anything go pop if I was to just touch
it without making any adjustments he
would make a hole in the surface which
due to the surface tension would rip the
bubble open and it would pop to prevent
this tie is cool a design with the same
soap mixture he used to make the bubbles
this gives the water molecules in the
bubble film something similar to stick
to so the whole seals up around his hand
the bubble rearranges itself using his
hand as a wall and this reduces surface
tension so using his wet hand he can
reach in take hold the smoke-filled
bubble and he's then able to pull it out
of the other bubbles and become a bubble
Hiro Babu
[Music]
you
